attributes.action: change the rules so the guiding association can do quazar paintball e.t.c
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that it is very sexist that girl guiding association can not do the paintballing and quazar, girls can go to explorer scouts and do all that kind of stuff so why is it any different to being a girl guide or a ranger i ay that anything explorers can do we should be able to do

rejection.details: Please refer this query to the Girl Guiding Association.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
